sentiment.conclusion: Use these insights to prioritize improvements and enhance customer experience.
sentiment.adviceNegativeStrong: Immediate action is needed to address customer concerns and improve satisfaction.
sentiment.advicePositiveStrong: This is a strong foundation for growth and customer retention.
sentiment.advicePositiveModerate: There's room for improvement to reach excellence.
sentiment.adviceMixed: Focus on addressing key issues to improve satisfaction.

gmb.title: How to get your Google My Business URL:

tripadvisor.title: How to get your TripAdvisor URL:
tripadvisor.step1: Go to TripAdvisor and search for your business
tripadvisor.step4: Copy the URL from your browser's address bar

booking.title: How to get your Booking.com URL:
booking.step1: Go to Booking.com and search for your property
booking.step4: Copy the URL from your browser's address bar

trustpilot.title: How to get your Trustpilot Company Domain:
trustpilot.step1: Go to Trustpilot and search for your business (e.g., "pipedrive")
trustpilot.step2: From the business's Trustpilot page, identify the domain in the URL (e.g., "pipedrive.com")

airbnb.title: How to get your Airbnb URL:
airbnb.step1: Go to Airbnb and search for your listing
airbnb.step3: Copy the URL from your browser's address bar

results.title: Analysis Results
results.noData: No data available in your document

emotionalTargeting.title: Emotional Targeting
emotionalTargeting.explanation: Understanding your customers' emotional responses allows you to craft marketing messages that resonate on a deeper level. Target these primary emotions in your advertising content to build stronger connections with your audience.
emotionalTargeting.description: The emotional analysis above reveals the predominant sentiments expressed by your customers. Leveraging these emotions in your marketing creates more resonant messages that connect on a deeper level. For each primary emotion, consider these targeted approaches:
emotionalTargeting.primaryEmotionAdvice: Craft marketing that emphasizes this emotional response, using language, imagery, and stories that evoke similar feelings in potential customers. This alignment between your marketing and customers' emotional experience builds authenticity and strengthens brand connection.
emotionalTargeting.conclusion: Emotional marketing bypasses rational decision-making processes and connects directly with the psychological drivers of purchasing behavior. By aligning your messaging with the emotions already associated with your product, you create more compelling and effective marketing campaigns.

hero.title: Analyze and Understand Customer Reviews with AI-Powered Precision
hero.subtitle: Unlock actionable insights from your customer feedback across various platforms.

home.journeyDescription: From raw data to actionable intelligence, our platform guides you every step of the way.
home.aiAnalysisDescription: Leverage advanced AI to extract sentiment, emotions, and key themes from your reviews.
home.smartClassificationDescription: Automatically categorize reviews by topic, helping you pinpoint specific areas for improvement.
home.scalableProcessingDescription: Process thousands of reviews quickly and efficiently, no matter the volume.
home.efficiencyDescription: Our platform integrates seamlessly with popular review sites to streamline your workflow.
home.readyToTransform: Ready to Transform Your Customer Feedback?
home.transformDescription: Join businesses worldwide who are using Allside to gain a competitive edge and delight their customers.
home.pricingDescription: Choose a plan that fits your business needs, with no hidden fees.

hero.title: About Allside
hero.subtitle: We transform customer feedback into actionable business intelligence through advanced AI analysis.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: At Allside, we believe customer feedback is the most valuable asset for any business. However, manually analyzing thousands of reviews is time-consuming and often leads to missing important insights.
mission.description2: Our mission is to democratize access to advanced sentiment analysis and customer intelligence tools, making them accessible to businesses of all sizes.
mission.description3: We help businesses understand what their customers truly think, identify opportunities for improvement, and make data-driven decisions that enhance customer satisfaction.

objectives.title: Our Objectives
objectives.subtitle: We are committed to helping businesses succeed through a deeper understanding of their customers.

efficiency.title: Improve Efficiency
efficiency.description: Automate customer review analysis to save time and resources while providing deeper insights than manual analysis.

insights.title: Actionable Insights
insights.description: Transform raw customer feedback into clear, actionable recommendations that drive business improvement and growth.

satisfaction.title: Enhance Satisfaction
satisfaction.description: Help businesses identify and resolve customer pain points to improve overall customer satisfaction and loyalty.

technology.title: Advanced AI Technology
technology.description1: Our platform leverages cutting-edge artificial intelligence and natural language processing to analyze customer sentiment with unprecedented accuracy.
technology.description2: We use advanced machine learning algorithms to identify patterns, emotions, and themes in customer feedback across multiple platforms and languages.
technology.imageAlt: AI technology analyzing data with neural networks

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Business?
cta.description: Join thousands of businesses who trust Allside to better understand their customers.
